Tests that unknown uniforms don't cause errors.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


Canvas.getContext
PASS context exists

PASS location of unknown uniform should be null
PASS getError was expected value: NO_ERROR : there should be no error from getting an unknown uniform
PASS getError was expected value: NO_ERROR : there should be no error from trying to set an unknown uniform

PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
